skillTree.localised_description: Even Chaos Lords struggle to tame Manticores, so for an exalted one to break the will of such a ferocious monstrosity? Then she must surely be destined for greatness.
What magic can penetrate the searing hatred within the minds of the Blood God's most brutal followers.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

skillTree.localised_description: "We will slaughter them all, and laugh as they beg for mercy. It will be a good day."
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

ui_effects.localised_text: Activates when an enemy unit is destroyed within 30 metres

skillTree.localised_description: The favour of Hound is earned in blood and the brutal decimation of His foes.
The raging fire of hate manifests itself in battle, immolating enemies in its smouldering heat.
Hrefna's well of eternal rage never runs dry, nor does the ceaseless influx of warriors eager to serve under her command.
This brutal Hero of Khorne decimates the lands of man and monster alike – the avatar or wrath incarnate!
When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
"I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

items.colour_text: The bleached skull of a long-dead rival of Hrefna, enchanted by the tribe's shaman, hangs around her neck as a reminder of what will happen if you get on her bad side.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Egil Styrbjorn has taken many consorts from amongst the womenfolk of Strovengaard, for many women of Norsca are desirous to share their beds with warriors who bear the stigmata of the Dark Gods. From these countless wives did Styrbjorn sire a brood of 13 progeny of all ages, amongst them were Hrefna and Fraygerd, axe-maidens of consummate skill and deadliness.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Hrefna when embedded into the same army as Fraygerd
Melee defence: +5 for Hrefna when embedded into the same army as Fraygerd

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The steeds of Chaos are vicious mounts enveloped in thick plate barding - coal-black chargers infused with Daemon blood and a temperament to match.
